title: Average Earnings Per Shift, Anthracite Coal Miners for Dortmund Mining District, Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1884-1920 (2)--Original Data, 1920-1932. Source: Zeitschrift Fur Berg-Hutten Und Salinenwesen

This NBER data series q08147b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: q08147b
